Long story short, overestimated my demand... Will sell them at my cost until Monday. Pretty much the best price on these risers in the USA. They're selling for about $10 now in china but you'll have to deal with customs and shipping. 

$11.99 per riser with free shipping. Coupon code: LEBWeekend
